text: Howard "Howie" Montgomery (born August 22, 1940) is a former professional basketball player for the San Francisco Warriors of the NBA.Howie Montgomery NBA & ABA Stats | Basketball-Reference.com He played a total of 20 games.Howard Montgomery Statistics on JustSportsStats.com == References == Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:San Francisco Warriors draft picks Category:San Francisco Warriors players Category:Small forwards Category:Texas–Pan American Broncs men's basketball players Category:American men's basketball players
